Details.Textbox24: Imperial Irrigation District delivers water to over 450,000 acres of highly productive farmland in southernmost Southern California. Established by a vote of the people in 1911, IID is the nation's largest irrigation district and serves one of the fastest-growing regions in the West. The district's electrical division is the sixth largest utility in California. IID Energy manages approximately 1000 MW of energy derived from a diverse portfolio of renewable and non-renewable resources, including our own generation and purchased power. We serve more than 138,000 customers in a territory that covers 6,471 miles of Southern California desert. That territory includes two rapidly growing areas; the Imperial and the Coachella Valley.
Details.Textbox41: 333 E. Barioni Blvd. Imperial, California US
